attributes.action: Introduce a couple more bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Compared to the rest of Europe, the UK enjoys fewer bank holidays. More bank holidays would mean: 
More petrol being saved- which is getting more and more expensive
Less car fumes - less damage to the environment  Less car accidents
More quality time  
EVERY WORKER would greatly appreciate more bank holidays - it's the perfect incentive and reward for all the hard work we do 
Company's would benefit from improved productivity and morale
Staff's health and well-being would vastly improve
Less stress from work, which can sometimes affect personal life too.
Just a small change, which could bring many many benefits...

rejection.details: There are a number of petitions running that are similar to this. Including: http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BREAKS/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
